title: AI Marketing Coordinator
subtitle: Automate campaign execution, performance tracking, and cross-channel coordination
description: Deploy an AI marketing coordinator that manages campaign workflows, monitors performance metrics, coordinates cross-functional tasks, and ensures every launch runs smoothly.

benefits.title: Campaign Workflow Automation
benefits.description: Orchestrate multi-step campaigns across email, social, ads, and content—with automated handoffs between designers, copywriters, and managers.

benefits.title: Real-Time Performance Monitoring
benefits.description: Track KPIs across all channels, detect underperforming campaigns early, and trigger alerts when metrics fall below targets.

benefits.title: Asset Management
benefits.description: Organize campaign assets, track approvals, ensure brand compliance, and distribute finalized materials to the right channels automatically.

benefits.title: Cross-Team Coordination
benefits.description: Sync tasks between marketing, design, sales, and product teams—updating project management tools and notifying stakeholders of changes.

features.title: Campaign Scheduling
features.description: Plan, schedule, and execute multi-channel campaigns with automated reminders, deadline tracking, and dependency management.

features.title: Analytics Dashboards
features.description: Pull data from Google Analytics, Meta Ads, HubSpot, and more—generating unified reports that show ROI across all channels.

features.title: Approval Workflows
features.description: Route campaign materials through stakeholder reviews, track feedback, and consolidate approvals before launch.

features.title: Lead Handoff Automation
features.description: When marketing campaigns generate leads, AI coordinator enriches data, scores quality, and syncs to CRM with campaign attribution.

features.title: Content Distribution
features.description: Publish approved blog posts, social updates, and email campaigns to scheduled channels—handling formatting and platform-specific optimizations.

features.title: Anomaly Detection
features.description: Identify sudden drops in traffic, email open rates, or ad performance—sending alerts with diagnostic data to investigate issues fast.

useCases.title: Product Launch Coordination
useCases.description: Manage 50+ tasks across teams: brief designers, schedule social posts, coordinate PR outreach, track website updates, and compile launch metrics—all automated.

useCases.title: Event Marketing Automation
useCases.description: Handle webinar promotion workflows: send invitation emails, post to social channels, remind registrants, sync attendee data to CRM, and follow up post-event.

useCases.title: Monthly Reporting
useCases.description: Auto-generate executive marketing reports by pulling data from 10+ platforms, calculating key metrics, and creating visual dashboards—delivered on the 1st of each month.

metrics.efficiency: Save 20+ hours per week on campaign coordination
